thread.title: Canelo Alvarez, Julio Cesar Chavez hit NYC to promote HBO bout
thread.title_full: Canelo Alvarez, Julio Cesar Chavez hit NYC to promote HBO bout

title: Canelo Alvarez, Julio Cesar Chavez hit NYC to promote HBO bout
text:
Canelo Alvarez and Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. hit the Big Apple to promote May 6 HBO bout Canelo Alvarez, Julio Cesar Chavez hit NYC to promote HBO bout NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Canelo Alvarez (r.), Oscar De La Hoya (c.) and Julio Cesar Chavez (l.) take Manhattan on Tuesday. NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  29 AM 
Two-division World Champion Canelo Alvarez and WBC Middleweight World Champ Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. square off in midtown Tuesday to hype up their fight scheduled for May 6, with Golden Boy Promotions boss Oscar De La Hoya. 
The Las Vegas bout can be seen live on HBO Pay-Per-View. 
Said Alavrez, "I'm excited to announce my fight against Julio Cesar Chavez, Jr. and confirm that I will be prepared, like I've been throughout my career, to give a great fight." 
" I dedicate this fight to Mexico," Chavez said. "I'm going to win, but my country will to because this is the fight that boxing needs." Join the Conversation:
